writer.name: 约翰·J·麦克劳克林 John J. McLaughlin

this_title: Shark Week - Megalodon: The Monster Shark Lives
trans_title: 巨齿鲨：还活着的鲨鱼怪物
introduction: In April 2013, a fishing vessel was attacked off the coast of South Africa, killing all on board. A TV crew documented Marine Biologist Collin Drake as he worked to determine the predator responsible. His discovery is presented in this shocking footage.注：这是一部伪纪录片，巨齿鲨在两百万年前已经绝种，至今为止没有任何科学证据证明巨齿鲨仍旧存在。
chinese_title: 巨齿鲨：还活着的鲨鱼怪物
foreign_title: Shark Week - Megalodon: The Monster Shark Lives
